  • Our Partners

Our partnersHospitality education. Reimagined.

We’re working together to provide you with a brighter future

At the Indian School of Hospitality, we’re focused on your future. By partnering with some of the most renowned names in the hospitality industry, we’re working together to bring you the highest quality internships, teaching standards, and career support throughout your time with us.

What are the benefits of our partnerships?

Our collaboration with our industry partners mean you’ll be subject to numerous academic and professional benefits during your studies:

  • Exposure to international brands
  • Placements and internships
  • Access to industry experts
  • Exposure to a vast professional network

Our partners
